verbs.description: [ARG0: AmericanAmerican Airlines] [V: wants] [ARG1: “ no part ” of the cruel Trump immigration policies that separate children from their parents] . On Wednesday morning the airline company released this statement . Statement on Recent Reports of Separated Families ...
